title: Invitation, "Formica Corporation: 75th Anniversary", 1988
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description: The lower edges of three Formica (tm) rectangles are inserted in clear plastic jackets, covering about one-third of the rectangles and mounted in a row on white cardboard. Each rectangle has a hole punched near the top; two of three possible ideographic designs, one imprinted directly beneath the hole and the second just above the lower edge; and multiple lines of type in upper and lower case, with highlighted content capitalized. The three rectangles comprise an invitation to a Formica Corporation event: the leftmost, in a gold-mustard color, extends the invitation; the central, in dusty pink, specifies the venue; and the rightmost, in  silver-green, describes the program, featuring Tibor Kalman, and calls for invitees to respond. The whole is enclosed in a white envelope.

tombstone.epitaph:
Invitation, "Formica Corporation: 75th Anniversary", 1988.
1988. Offset lithography. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-377-1/5.
